article.class: post-58 page type-page status-publish hentry no-post-thumbnail

div.style: background-image: url(https://www.laurelspringschool.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/School-HQ-Cropped-Blue.png); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center; background-size: cover;

hr.div: Laurel Springs School, with the support of the community, is dedicated to providing quality, educational experiences within our unique environment, to enable our children to become well rounded, repsonsible members of society. We strive to maintain our traditional core values, to attain and surpass all New Jersey educational standards with a focus on student achievement, and to instill an appetite and joy for lifelong learning.

div.div: "We guide our students to grow individually and cooperatively utilizing 7 Dragon Characteristics: Curiosity, Resourcefulness, Courage, Self-discipline, Citizenship, Grit, and Nobility!"
